At that time, they all heard heavy footsteps and roaring noises, as
well as the clinking chain. Somehow, the thing had gotten free.

Guard 1: He's quite dead I see! You thought we'd buy THAT? Come on!

Guard 2: Huh... I think he's mad...

Guard 3: Slag! We'd better restrain it before the boss learns about it!

Guard 4: No way I put my buttplates on the line for what that clown
just did!

Guard 1: Yeah... You're right. Say, mighty soldier, why don't you just
finish the job?

Guard 1 raised his rifle and aimed Quickstrike right between the eyes.
The other three guards did just the same.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "Whoa, that's a big fello." Quickstrike commented dropping the 
> datapad he had been given.  He began to pounder for a mement.
> 'I could just slag it while it's chained there and say I won,  but 
> that'd be no fun.  Maybe I can trick them guys into comming in here 
> I can sick it on them.'  He thought to himself snickering.  He aimed 
> his snake mouth and shot off one of the chains holding the creatures 
> right arm.  He then fired again and took out one of the clamps that 
> was holding it.  Knowing the creature was likely to get loose soon 
> he turned and scurried to the door,  but then slowed down and walked 
> out calmly.  
> 
> "Well that was a darn good fight.  Still, I wish he woulda lasted  a 
> bit longer.  I was just beginnin' to enjoy it.  The mech flued was 
> just startin' to flow, ya' know."  He lied to them.   
>

> solid
